entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
